title: Spelling it out
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Victoria. Education Dept. Curriculum Programs
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/English language - Orthography and spelling
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/English language - Teacher training
description: Shows the teaching of spelling in primary schools from the nineteenth century to the present day. Could be used in conjunction with the Victorian Education Department's booklet "The Teaching of spelling". Changing attitudes and a variety of teaching methods are also looked at.
